"You don't create the mode, please delete this shortcut"
Swifty, the most popular tool on Google Play. One touch, shortcuts, favorite apps, messages are at hand.
Due to phone system, please install Cool Browser to unhide videoes.
Due to phone system, please install the latest COOLBrowser to unhide videos.
Wow! More surprises are waiting for you!
Feel boring about your phone? Many cool new themes here!

Congrats! Applock applied successfully.Tips: Enable "Advanced Protection", then no one can peek at your secrets by uninstalling LEO Privacy. But if really want uninstall our app, please check the side bar.

%1$d new videos found, click to hide now
Monitor data usage, in case of excess
You have new apps to backup
Enable Anti-theft function, accurate locate lost phone
Take photo if password is wrong
Some others peek on your phone
Take photo if wrong password is input
Control lost mobile by family\'s phone
No SIM card inserted, cannot send SMS
LEO Privacy would never make any additional charge during this process.Only carriers will charge for text fee.
This function will protect your privacy and help you find your lost mobile. To use it, you must preset a mobile number, and when the mobile is lost, send SMS via the preset number.
You can use the following functions:
[LEOMASTER] The position of the lost phone is located, click to view: %1$s . http://www.leomaster.com
Are you sure to ignore the result? To do so, you will not gain the score
A click to finish privacy protection
Locate lost phone, tracking position precisely
Anti-theft functions demand SMS ROOT privileges
Please choose "Messages" in Permission Manager and enable LEO Privacy.
Please choose "Application" in Permission Manager and select LEO Privacy, then assign the "Access SMS/MMS"&"Send SMS" to us.
If you have any further questions or requirements, please do not hesitate to contact us and follow us on Facebook & Whatsapp.
Enjoying LEO Privacy? Please take a moment to rate us in Google Play Store, thanks for your support!
Sorry, the battery information is temporarily unavailable
For more interesting and official news of LEO Privacy, please immediately follow us on facebook.
Advanced protection started! Operate in side column to unload the LEO Privacy.
Flow runs too fast! Don\'t worry, here comes Swifty! Just a click to start the cellular data and WiFi. Save data flow just now!
To ensure normal operation of application lock, check LEO Privacy in "Application Program Optimization"->"Detail" and select "Disable", or set them later in Application Lock.
Professional and optimized speed tester to ensure higher and more stable WiFi speed and provide free WIFI with higher quality.
Test your WiFi speed now! Select the fastest WiFi connection!
Click Edit to check and unhide the video
Whether to restore intercepted record to call history synchronistically?
Display intercepted calls in notification bar
Private contact, remove from the private contact list first

resources.string: The charging rate will reduce 20%,confirm to close?
Want to browse your hidden photos more easily? Create a shortcut on the desktop!
Want to browse your hidden videos more easily? Create a shortcut on the desktop!
Add a desktop shortcut, to easily manage blacklist and blocking records.
Worry about network security? Create a desktop shortcut to check Wi-Fi security any time!
Give permissions to fix App Lock problems.
Charging screensaver can save <font color="#00a8ff">%1$d</font> min charging time. <font color="#00a8ff">%2$d</font> power-consuming applications have been cleaned.
Automatically clean power-consuming apps while charging.
Hi all, I have added %1$s to my blacklist as a crank call. Pay attention to this number! Want to avoid crank calls like me? Just download LEO Privacy for free：%2$s
Create a security question to help us verify your identity should you forget password.
Security question and answer set successfully
Thank you for your feedback, we will strive to improve your experience.
This theme will be applied on your lock screen.
No write access to hide this video.
Your email address is incorrect. Please try again.
Click Settings and enter the correct password and then reset it.
Tap Lock Settings to set a locking time
Try more free and beautiful themes.
Due to system limit of Android 4.4 or above,privacy SMS may not work properly.
Imported successfully! Due to the system limitation, you have to delete the original images and you can check them in Hide Images of LEO Privacy.
There is not enough available SD card storage to hide images. Please free some space.
There is not enough available SD card storage to restore images. Please free some space.
Enter a name for this mode
You can\'t change the name of Guest Mode
Enter your data limit and add current data usage
You\'ve used %1$s%% of your monthly allowance.Addtional data charges will apply for additional usage.
You have used 100% of your data plan. Please shut off the Moblie Data.
Your phone will enable alerts once your monthly data reaches the limit you set.
Deleting this mode will remove the corresponding lock settings you have set in the Time Lock or Position Lock
Deleting this mode will remove the corresponding lock settings you have set in the Time Lock
Deleting this mode will remove the corresponding lock settings you have set in the Position Lock
%1$s is in use. Deleting it will enable Guest Mode.
Are you sure to delete this mode?
Only you know how to skip the cover and unlock the apps
Slide to unlock from Decline, SMS and Answer in order
Oops! Please slide a longer distance
You can set Time Lock or Position Lock to switch modes automatically. Set now?
Time Lock can enable a mode at a specific time you have set. Add your own time lock.
Position Lock can start a mode at a specific location you have set. Location will be marked by Wi-Fi Hotspot
Enable Advanced Protection in case of being uninstalled by malicious programs.
One tap to lock new apps
Pinch two fingers to unlock Zipper
Start LEO Privacy for your protection.
Server is not responding. Try later.
Click "Autostart Manager" and allow LEO Privacy to be added in the auto-start list.
Click "Autostart Manager" and allow LEO Privacy to be added in the auto-start list.
Go to "Protected Apps" and add LEO Privacy to the list of Protected apps
Go to Background Manager to tap Autostart Manager and add LEO Privacy to autostart list
Give LEO Privacy permissions to monitor the use of apps
Please give LEO Privacy the "Autostart" permission to keep protecting your apps after your phone restart
Your current Wi-Fi network is unsecured
%1$d new images found, click to hide now
Your Wi-Fi network is not connected
Wi-Fi can not connect to network
You are about to connect to an unsecure Wi-Fi network.It\'s possible that your messages will be read
Suggest to connect to another Wi-Fi network
Add another phone number to remote control the stolen phone by sending it the messages
Send Anti-theft order to Friend\'s number：
Detect the safety of connected Wi-Fi
Take photo if wrong password is input for %1$s times
%1$d times found people want to break-in
This person want to see your %1$s
Send orders to the stolen mobile
Warning! Your mobile phone type is %1$s, the SIM card has been changed. If operated by yourself, please ignore this notification.【LEOMASTER】
Orders will be sent to friend’s phone via SMS, send now?
You can use basic function now, for advance function, go to Device Manager

You have selected to backup control orders via SMS: 1. lock mobile: #lockmobile 2. locate mobile position: #locateposition 3. send alarm: #alert 4. clear data: #formatdata 5. enable lock; tracking&alarm&erase: #onekey. If the mobile is lost, send corresponding orders to it. If you forget the orders, click "Backup remote control orders" to send this SMS again. [LEOMASTER]
The number you input is your mobile number, please input again
Anti-theft functions demand Read & Send SMS privileges. Please grant permissions
Please choose "Permissions" item in the permissions and select LEO Privacy, enable "Send SMS messages"and"Read SMS messages".
Due to the limitation of Android, the intruder prevention function could not work properly.
Hide Images, Hide Videos, more functions here!
Click the edit button and tick the images, then unhide images available.
You\'ll receive calls from this number, are you sure to delete it from blacklist?
Talk time is < %1$s s, mark and add the number to blacklist?
Lock the private Apps is recommended
%1$s added to blacklist by %2$s users,recommend to add
Unsecured Wi-Fi may threaten your privacy and security anytime
Your mobile is under protection of the anti-theft function, but this is maybe not the case for your friends\' mobiles. Be quick to help them.
Recommend the Harassment Intercept function to your friends~
Like us? <font color="#FFF600">Share with your friends</font>
Hi, I\'m using the anti-theft function of LEO Privacy. I can remotely control my mobile just by sending an MMS. It\'s so convenient and I want you to have a try.

Hi, I\'m using the crank call interception function of LEO Privacy. By using it, I mask all annoying salesmen. The most important is, it can automatically identify incoming calls. It\'s so convenient and I really want you to have a try.
Hi, I\'m using the Intrusion prevention function of LEO Privacy. It has helped me shoot %1$s persons who peek at my mobile. Now, I know who are peeking at my mobile. Do you want to have a try?

Due to the system restriction, you need to open the permission to enable LEO Privacy to normal operation. Pls follow the steps as below: click "Add program" > "Add applications running in background" > Select and add LEO Privacy
Authorize LEO Privacy to lock app.
Wanna help your friends to block this crank call? Share it and let LEO Privacy to protect them too!
Due to system limit, LEO Privacy needs the permissions to perform actions for better protection
Enable Break-in Alert to capture snoopers
LEO Privacy is monitoring your privacy status at the background,keeping you informed of changes
Tips: SMS will be sent to the Family No. if SIM card is changed
Enable Advanced Protection and add LEO Privacy to Device Manager
Auto recognise phone number，keep harassment away
Auto-photo of snoopers breaking into Home Screen Lock
Auto-photo when unlocking phone with the wrong password
Auto-photo of snoopers breaking into App Lock
Auto-photo when unlocking apps with the wrong password
Recommend to enable the Home Screen Lock function
Camera access of Home Screen Lock has been activated
Enable the \"Advanced Protection\" before you activate this function, please disable the \"Advanced Protection\" before you uninstall \"LEO Privacy\", are you sure you want to continue?
It won\'t be able to take photos of snoopers peeking into your phone when you disable this function
Take photos automatically when unlocking the applications or phone with the wrong password
未通过\n您还可以再试 %d 次
尝试太多次未通过\n请等 %,d 秒后重新验证
按此蓝色区域任一处\n开始写字
写完后\n拇指请离开萤幕
选字建议:\n姓名中的一个字或英文名
如何签字:\n1.按住 2.写字 3.放开
请再次签写解锁字\n让系统辨识写字特征
辨识未完成\n请继续签写
您选的字长度不够\n请增加长度或换字
已达安全标準\n下一步: 特征辨识
你写的字太长\n或是写的时间太久
建议:\n减少字数或 10 秒内写完
1.请用手机一角当笔尖写字\n2.随性的写，写潦草一点
您写字的特征\n不固定，请保持稳定
建议:\n请看签字教学或重新设定
此次特征与前几次\n差异太大，不列入纪录
建议:\n请保持稳定，继续辨识
您写字的特征\n不固定，请保持稳定
建议:\n请看签字教学并重新设定
尚未完成设定，您确定要离开？
是否重置签名，重新设定
全新解锁体验\n用个人写字特征，取代复杂密码
按此蓝色区域任一处\n开始写字
写完后\n拇指请离开萤幕
如何签字:\n1.按住 2.写字 3.放开
做得很好\n请继续第二个练习
练习二: 将字写得随性潦草\n有个人特色的字可提高安全
将字写得随性潦草，有个人特色
做得很好\n请继续最后的练习
练习三: 请写任何想写的字\n测试您写字的安全强度
如何提高安全:\n1.增加字的长度或换字\n2.多用手腕，增加个人特色
请用手机一角当笔尖写字\n用笔尖写字会比较顺手
将字写得随性潦草\n有个人特色的字可提高安全
教学未完成，是否离开教学
可向被盗手机发送以下指令，执行对应操作
防盗指令将会以短信形式发送到预留号码。您可以用预留号码发送防盗指令控制手机。
关闭防盗，您的手机将失去保护，确认关闭吗？
手机防盗开启成功，已将防盗指令发送给预留号码
设定成功！将默认使用签字解锁
关闭签字解锁后则无法通过手机签字解锁应用，确定关闭？
当前未开启签字解锁，是否立即开启？
关闭高级保护后，手机防盗，系统锁屏入侵防护等功能不可用，隐私卫士也可以被随意卸载
卸载隐私卫士前需关闭高级保护权限，可能会导致部分功能不可用。确认关闭？
当前高级保护未开启，手机防盗的清除数据功能，系统锁屏入侵防护功能不可用。是否立即开启？
当前从外置存储卡读取内容，可能过程较长
检测到最近新增了<font color="#00a8ff">%1$d</font>张图片
检测到最近新增了<font color="#00a8ff">%1$d</font>个视频
您新增了一些应用未加锁，可能泄露隐私哦
您新增了一些图片，私密图片建议隐藏起来
您新增了一些视频，不希望被别人看见？赶快隐藏起来吧
更多功能，点击这里看看
开启应用锁权限以修复应用锁问题
建议开启手机防盗，点击进入防盗页面
主题暂不适用于签字解锁哦
签字解锁密钥已到期，升级隐私卫士后方可继续使用
您已开启高级保护，点此方可卸载隐私卫士哦
把防盗指令通过短信备份给亲友号码
